meanings.definition: An error in printing where a mistake is made in the text or image.
meanings.sent1: The misprinting on the flyer caused confusion among the readers.
meanings.sent2: The misprinting of the company logo made it look unprofessional.
meanings.sent3: The misprinting of the menu turned 'chicken' into 'kitchen'!
meanings.sent4: Her misprinting of the address led the package astray.
meanings.sent5: The misprinting of the map left us lost in the city.

meanings.definition: The act of making a mistake in the process of printing.
meanings.sent1: Misprinting can result in costly reprints for the publisher.
meanings.sent2: The misprinting of the book cover delayed its release.
meanings.sent3: The misprinting of the poster turned the event into a comedy show!
meanings.sent4: His misprinting of the contract jeopardized the deal.
meanings.sent5: The misprinting of the tickets caused chaos at the entrance.
